Issue.creator: sassit
Issue.summary: Core Rust SDK does not compile
Issue.environment: It just does not compile right.
Issue.description: /usr/local/cargo/git/checkouts/sawtooth-core-bddd99292bb7bf5f/ca0e8e1/sdk/rust/build.rs:66:15 66 | ..Default::default() ^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^^ field `_future_options` is private error: aborting due to previous error For more information about this error, try `rustc --explain E0451`. error: Could not compile `sawtooth_sdk`. warning: build failed, waiting for other jobs to finish... error: build failed ERROR: Service 'processor' failed to build: The command '/bin/sh -c cargo build' returned a non-zero code: 101 {code} >
